body:
Okay, the ramfs one is up and running. But now there are *new* errors!

e.g. http://build.golang.org/log/ba627fd1160ef9247ee6677048042de8a0cdfb57 has 4 errors, 3(?) of them new.... cmd/pack, net/http/cgi, runtime, runtime/pprof, ....

I think I need to get you a stand-alone program that acts like the coordinator binary (a client to the buildlet) and have you run it, confirming you can actually get a successful build out of this thing.
